headline: Incyte (INCY) Advances Clinical Trials for Povorcitinib Across Multiple Conditions
summary: Incyte Corporation (NASDAQ:INCY) ranks among the most undervalued NASDAQ stocks to buy now. Citizens JMP reaffirmed its Market Perform rating on Incyte Corporation (NASDAQ:INCY) on September 18 after the company revealed updated clinical trial findings for its medication povorcitinib. The company evaluated povorcitinib in patients with moderate-to-severe hidradenitis suppurativa in its pivotal Phase 3 STOP-HS1/HS2 […]
